title.rendered: ULTIMATE JET VACATIONS ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC APPOINTMENTS IN NORTH AMERICAN REGIONS

content.rendered:
Andrew Rein, Director of Business Development – Northeast and Canada
Katie Lindblad, Director of Business Development – Southeast
Kevin Peyrache, Director of Business Development – West Coast and British Columbia

MIAMI, May 8, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Ultimate Jet Vacations (UJV), the premier luxury wholesale travel company specializing in global five-star experiences, announces new strategic appointments in North America as the brand continues its global expansion and customer-centric strategy intended to enhance its relationships and elevate service offerings for travel advisors and professionals. These appointments complement the existing business development team and underscore UJV’s commitment to strategic growth, while highlighting the importance of the African and European markets.



Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ultimate-jet-vacations-announces-strategic-appointments-in-north-american-regions-302139157.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
